lead_paragraph: Scott Kazmir combined with three relievers on a two-hitter to win his first start with the Los Angeles Dodgers, who shut out the San Diego Padres for the second straight game, 3-0 Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: Kazmir, Dodgers Shut Out Padres 2nd Straight Game, 3-0
headline.main: Kazmir, Dodgers Shut Out Padres 2nd Straight Game, 3-0

snippet: Scott Kazmir combined with three relievers on a two-hitter to win his first start with the Los Angeles Dodgers, who shut out the San Diego Padres for the second straight game, 3-0 Tuesday night....
